h2_title: Spells to Unlock to Upgrade Rock Solid
content: With the Rock Solid spell now yours, the Alteration tab of the Self-Advancement menu will now show the Rock Solid skill tree alongside Cloud Step. There are 6 different skills you can awaken to improve Rock Solid, which are:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Parry.md', within the main section titled 'How to Parry', specifically from the subsection 'Spells to Unlock to Upgrade Rock Solid'.
The content is as follows:
With the Rock Solid spell now yours, the Alteration tab of the Self-Advancement menu will now show the Rock Solid skill tree alongside Cloud Step. There are 6 different skills you can awaken to improve Rock Solid, which are:
